headline: Ask HN: Pull requests based reviwable staging instance?
description:
Hi developers who use pull requests based work flow, have you ever worked with a flow where all opened pull requests' branches merged with shadow master behind the scene as a reviewable branch deployed to a staging server?

That is all opened PRs are still opened, the master branch stays as it is, just the mixed of PRs'branches + shadow-master gets deployed and let project manager review.

Any PR can be marked with label to be excluded and re-mark to be included, and every push to any pull request will trigger to automated build (merging all pull quests)
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 基于拉动请求的可重复使用的暂存实例？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 基於拉動請求的可重複使用的暫存實例？
description_zh-Hans:
Hi developers who use pull requests based work flow, have you ever worked with a flow where all opened pull requests' branches merged with shadow master behind the scene as a reviewable branch deployed to a staging server?

也就是说，所有打开的PR仍然是打开的，主分支保持原样，只是PR的混合分支+影子主分支被部署并让项目经理审查。

任何PR都可以用标签标记为排除，并重新标记为包含，每推送到任何拉取请求都会触发自动构建（合并所有拉取请求）。

任何PR都可以用標籤標記為排除，並重新標記為包含，每推送到任何拉取請求都會觸發自動構建（合併所有拉取請求）。
